text: Lloyd Carlisle McCuiston Jr. (March 26, 1918 â€“ November 9, 2021) was an American Democratic politician. He was a member of the Arkansas House of Representatives from 1961 to 1994.http://www.arkleg.state.ar.us/assembly/2015/2015R/Bills/HR1045.pdf McCuiston was also a veteran of World War II. He was born in Memphis, Tennessee. McCuiston was also the State Speaker of the House between 1981 until 1983. McCuiston turned 100 in March 2018. He died in Memphis on November 9, 2021, at the age of 103.Lloyd C. title: Lloyd McCuiston
